mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_USER( USERID, NAME, PASSWORD, ADDRESS, PHONE, EMAIL, CAREER, POSITION, SEX, BIRTH, ENGNAME ) VALUES ( #{userid}, #{name}, #{password}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{career}, #{position}, #{sex}, #{birth}, #{engname} )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_USER SET ENGNAME=#{engname}, PASSWORD=#{password}, GRADE='0', ADDRESS=#{address}, PHONE=#{phone}, EMAIL=#{email}, CAREER=#{career}, POSITION=#{position} WHERE USERID=#{userid}
mapper.select: SELECT USERID, NAME, PASSWORD, GRADE, ADDRESS, PHONE, EMAIL, CAREER, POSITION, SEX, BIRTH, ENGNAME FROM T_USER
SELECT USERID, NAME, PASSWORD, GRADE, ADDRESS, PHONE, EMAIL, CAREER, POSITION, SEX, BIRTH, ENGNAME FROM T_USER WHERE USERID=#{userid}
SELECT USERID, NAME, PASSWORD, GRADE, ADDRESS, PHONE, EMAIL, CAREER, POSITION, SEX, BIRTH, ENGNAME FROM T_USER WHERE NAME=#{name} AND BIRTH=#{birth}
SELECT USERID, NAME, PASSWORD, GRADE, ADDRESS, PHONE, EMAIL, CAREER, POSITION, SEX, BIRTH, ENGNAME FROM T_USER WHERE USERID=#{userid} AND BIRTH=#{birth}
SELECT USERID, NAME, PASSWORD, GRADE, ADDRESS, PHONE, EMAIL, CAREER, POSITION, SEX, BIRTH, ENGNAME FROM T_USER WHERE USERID=#{userid} AND ISSHOW='Y'
